jobDescription: Mission  The Global Data and Content organization's mission is to contribute to Solera's 2020 mission by enabling Solera to become the most efficient and influential solutions and services provider within the automotive claims industry, by developing platform digital innovations and by driving knowledge dissemination and industry standards set up. The Global Data and Content Organization selects high value-added products, services and tools and leverages these solutions globally to enable Solera's rapid growth and market presence.  The Senior Data Developer is mainly responsible for developing and updating our databases with all the necessary information concerning the car manufacturer parts and labor times.  Position 80s MISSION 80sTo analyze data coming from OEM/Manufacturer raw data and to codify it into the databaseTo spend more than 85% of the time as a parts and/or labor developerTo produce the quantity of data files at the quality agreed periodicallyTo ensure excellent quality of the data files in line with company targetsTo actively collaborate with the teamTo provide input for the preparation of plans and forecastsTo analyze output reports and initiate corrective actionQualificationsEducation & Skills:Bachelorsâ€™ degree in Computer Engineering / Computer Programming / Management Information Systems / Computer ScienceMinimum of 3-5 years' experience in Automotive Industry, preferredResult/output drivenQuality output oriented / Detail orientedFluency in the local language and proficient in English (written and oral)Works independently within the frame of work and objectives defined with supervisor/manager and reports regularly on progress.Ensures a strong internal line of communication with data development team membersPotential to growTarget oriented, entrepreneurial, flexible, and innovative approach to operational management.Passion, humility, integrity, positive attitude, mission-driven, and self-directed.Knowledge of:Programming and development.SQLAbility to:Write computer language codeTroubleshoots issues and resolves errorsEffectively communicate ideasMulti-task, prioritize, coordinate projects and meet simultaneous deadlinesOrganize and plan work
